Cherrycake\Modules\DatabaseProvider::execute

execute

Executes a previously prepared query with the given parameters. Intended to be overloaded by a higher level implementation class

    Signature

    public function execute(array $prepareResult, array $parameters, [boolean $setup = false] )

    Parameters

    $prepareResult — array
    The prepared result as returned by the prepare method
    $parameters — array
    Hash array of the variables that must be applied to the prepared query in order to execute the final query, in the same order as are stated on the prepared sql. Each array element has the following keys:
    * type: One of the prepared statement variable type consts, i.e.: DATABASE_FIELD_TYPE_
    * value: The value to be used for this variable on the prepared statement
    $setup — boolean
    Optional array with additional options, See DatabaseResult::$setup for available options

    Returns

    DatabaseResult
    A provider-specific DatabaseResult object if the query has been executed correctly, false otherwise.
